level.heading: Judicial review.
level.text: A person or entity aggrieved by a decision of the Office of Administrative Hearings may appeal the decision to the District of Columbia Court of Appeals in accordance with Chapter 5 of Title 2 and pursuant to Chapter 18A of Title 2.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 validated a previously made technical correction in the punctuation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-357, see notes following ยง 7-2341.01.
For history of Law 19-171, see notes under ยง 7-242.
